name: Studio SIC ditta individuale
goal: Organize informative meetings between Italian citizens and Italian companies and European institutions on the opportunities offered by the European Union for growth and development.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives: Organize conferences and meetings with the aim of bringing citizens closer to institutions and providing useful information to those who want to start collaborative activities in the territories of Europe.
